**Status**: Lab Technician at the University of Michigan, Weber Lab <br>
**Field**: Ecology & Evolutionary Biology <br>
**Interests**: Macroecology, macroevolution, population genetics, machine learning <br>
**Techs**: R, Python, C++, Git, LaTeX, SLiM

## Summary

First-gen academic interested in patterns of ecological organization across spatiotemporal scales, the evolutionary drivers of those patterns, and how those patterns respond to global change. Fascinated with modern methods for evaluating ecological & evolutionary processes, particularly using citizen science and machine learning.
